mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counseling ( counsel_id, mem_id, counsel, counsel_category, counsel_method, counsel_title, counsel_description, counsel_status, counsel_req_datetime, counsel_url_user, counsel_url_cou, counsel_created_at, counsel_updated_at ) VALUES (COUNSEL_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{counsel}, #{counselCategory}, #{counselMethod}, #{counselTitle}, #{counselDescription}, 'S04001', #{counselReqDatetime}, #{counselUrlUser}, #{counselUrlCou}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM VACATION WHERE VA_REQUESTOR = #{vaRequestor} AND VA_CONFIRM = 'S03003' AND #{vaStart} BETWEEN VA_START AND VA_END
mapper.update: UPDATE COUNSELING SET COUNSEL_STATUS = #{counselStatus}, COUNSEL_UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE COUNSEL_ID = #{counselId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNSEL_REQ_DATETIME FROM COUNSELING WHERE COUNSEL = #{counsel} AND TRUNC(COUNSEL_REQ_DATETIME) = TRUNC(#{counselReqDatetime, jdbcType=DATE}) AND COUNSEL_STATUS IN ('S04001', 'S04003')
